amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funds made available by this Act by 1%, with the exception of funds made available to the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 253 (Roll no. 255).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 253 (Roll no. 255).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
